casebody.data:
STATE
v.
John Eddie MANGUM 452P16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 16, 2016 Nicholas C. Woomer-Deters, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Mangum, John Eddie. Robert T. Broughton, Assistant Attorney General, Kimberly S. Robb, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 16th of December 2016 by Defendant for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 16th of December 2016."
